venue.address_1: Gowen's Corner Plaza at Route 33 and Bayside
venue.name: The KRI Center for Consciousness Studies

item.description: Connecting To Spirit with Psychic/Medium Michelle McEwen Join Michelle and a small group while she connects to loved ones that have passed on. When our loved ones pass they are still with us and want to show us how much they are around. In this session, not only do love ones come thru but sometimes our guides and angels come through with a message. So we never know how these groups go. Please remember to come in with an open mind and heart. Michelle McEwen has been intuitive all her life and really started embracing her ability in 2007. She began doing card readings in 2009. Always seeking ways to expand on her abilities, she is often found in a seminar or training. In 2010, Michelle attended Advance Psychic Development with John Holland and some Shamanic classes. Michelle's reading style is very gentle, she listens to her clients yet she is very firm with her guidance. The readings will help give you direction in all aspects of your life. It could help you grow spiritually, if you want, and start or help the healing process. We all need guidance or confirmation in our lives to help us move forward. The cost is $20 with pre-registration at www.theCenterNH.com or $30 at the door, and we are limited to have only 20 in the audience, so be sure to reserve your spot today!
item.name: Gallery Reading with Psychic/Medium Michelle McEwen
